Description:
Surrounded by the Malá Fatra Mountains, Country Saloon Belá offers elegantly decorated rooms, a restaurant with an open fireplace, and a games room with bowling facilities. Some rooms are adapted for disabled guests. Vrátna Ski Centre is 10 km away.

A flat-screen TV with satellite channels is provided in each room. All units feature free wired internet, a desk and a minibar.

The on-site restaurant serves traditional Slovak cuisine. A selection of local drinks is available at the lounge bar.

Guests can play bowling, billiards, table football and air hockey on site. The hotel offers 2 bowling tracks and 2 billiards tables. Children can use a small playroom.

Country Saloon is easily accessible in the picturesque Belá Village, 20 metres from the main road connecting ilina and Terchová. Free private parking is provided.

Rafting facilities on the Váh River can be found at a distance of 10 km from the hotel. The town of ilina is 17 km away. Please inform Country Saloon Belá in advance of your expected arrival time. Description:
Situated in a secluded area and offering a wide range of leisure and sports facilities, the Hotel Branica can be found amid the Kysucké Hills and the Malá Fatra Range. All rooms have a balcony.

A flat-screen satellite TV, a minibar and a private bathroom including bathrobes are further features of each room. Free Wi-Fi is available.

You have free access to the swimming pool. Additional spa facilities include various saunas, a Tepidarium, a solarium and a hot tub. There are 2 tennis courts on site, a bowling and dart boards. You can also enjoy playing billiards or treat yourself to a massage.

Traditional Slovak dishes and international cuisine are served in the elegant restaurant of the Branica Hotel. There is also a café and a summer terrace with barbecue facilities.

The bus to ilina Vrátna dolina stops 300 metres away. Guests have included 1 hour of wellness in the price.

Description:
Park Hotel Tartuf is situated in Pustochotársky Park on the premises of the historical Beladice Castle, a Slovakian Cultural Heritage Site, and offers various accommodation units with free WiFi or cable internet, and free parking.

Some of the units have air conditioning and come with flat-screen TV. Most of them have a private bathroom with bathtub or shower, and free toiletries.

The restaurant serves buffet breakfast, and Slovak as well as international cuisine. Guests of the Tartuf can make use of the golf simulator, which is available at an extra charge.

For active guests, there is the possibility to go trekking to Mount Tribec, or sailing and fishing at the lake in the village of Jelenec, 5 km away. The city of Nitra is 18 km away, while the Gothic Castle of Gýme can be found within 10 km. Please note that the hotel accepts group reservations only upon request.
